alert.note: Alert for Bartholomew (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 1:10PM EST until March 08 at 5:24AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Haw Creek near Clifford. Mississinewa River near Ridgeville. .Rainfall amounts of around one and a half to two and a half inches across much of central Indiana is producing minor flooding along many area rivers, streams and creeks, including Haw Creek near Clifford which should crest later this evening and fall below flood late tonight. The Mississinewa River near Ridgeville should crest late this afternoon but moderate flooding should continue in that area into the overnight hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Haw Creek near Clifford. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, Near major flooding in progress along Haw Creek. Flooded roads include CR 450 N, Rocky Ford Road, 10th Street and Marr Road according to Columbus Response Plan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 PM EST Monday was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 2.7 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening.
